narrative.title: 15 Panzer Division - 1942Q2
narrative.situation: German Panzer Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q2.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armored exploitation and breakthrough force within Deutsches Afrikakorps
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Rocky desert plateau (Gazala-Bir Hakeim area), mixed sand and stone desert

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Combined arms coordination between panzers, infantry, and artillery
Rapid mobile operations in desert terrain
Experienced in anti-tank defense using 88mm Flak guns

environment.terrain_type: Rocky desert plateau (Gazala-Bir Hakeim area), mixed sand and stone desert
